attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EDL must be banned, they are attempting to incite racial hatred, Majority of EDL demonstrations reflect violence brutality and disrespect.Living in a multi-cultural society this must not be accepted.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
